data.message: I love this song. I was a mom that made some bad choices, and when addiction consumed me I ran, seeing my 2 daughters only at Xmas for 7 yrs. I've Been back for over 3 years clean and am rebuilding the relationships. This song brings tears to my eyes, I get it. People make mistakes but with effort we can repair the damage. Your mom had a big part in who you are today as a man and artist.

replies.message: I hardly ever read replies to major topics but for some reason I saw your post and wanted to say that you are just as brave as he is for airing this to the world.  Keep your head up, keep staying clean and keep being the addiction free mom you are being and are going to be for a long time.  Keep your faith...
God bless you Holly, keep doing well
